phrases.original: Please check to ensure that the link has not been modified, then try again.
phrases.translated: Please check to ensure that the link has not been modified, then try again.

phrases.original: Times shown above are in the {TIME-ZONE} time zone
phrases.translated: Times shown above are in the {TIME-ZONE} time zone

phrases.original: To process your unsubscription, select an option below:
phrases.translated: To process your unsubscription, select an option below:

phrases.original: Unsubscribe only from notifications about the particular invite shown above.
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe only from notifications about the particular invite shown above.

phrases.original: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invites sent (via {SENT-VIA}) to {RECIPIENT-NAME}
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invites sent (via {SENT-VIA}) to {RECIPIENT-NAME}

phrases.original: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invite recipients (not just {RECIPIENT-NAME})
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invite recipients (not just {RECIPIENT-NAME})

phrases.original: NOTE: this option requires logging in
phrases.translated: NOTE: this option requires logging in
